heading: good fella
subheading: there is still the formality of a runoff election, but oscar goodman isn't terribly concerned. he's going to be the next mayor of las vegas, and that's all there is to it. goodman, who narrowly missed winning the job outright from a field of nine candidates, told supporters tuesday night that "the result of this election is a foregone conclusion. i will be your next mayor." if that sounds a little brash, consider that goodman, an attorney, made his reputation defending mob figures like meyer lansky and tony "the ant" spilotro. martin scorsese liked goodman enough to cast him as himself in the movie casino. brash? certainly, but in a city like vegas, brash might just fit the bill.
